org.treetank.io.bytepipe

Interface IByteHandler

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    IByteHandler.IByteHandlerPipeline
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ByteHandlerPipeline, Encryptor, Zipper

    public interface IByteHandler
    Interface for the decorator, representing any byte representation to be serialized or to serialize.
    Author:
    Sebastian Graf, University of Konstanz

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  IByteHandler.IByteHandlerPipeline
      Concartenating interface for offering dedicated access to ByteHandlerPipeline for injections.

      Method to serialize any byte-chunk.
